name: Barbara-ian
description: Break-neck dungeoneering with 1 hit point. You play Barbara-ian, a mythical badass with perma-rage & a penchant for smashing. Featuring super fast paced physics based mayhem, one hit is all that stands between you and a quick...
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista/Win7/8 Processor: 1.8Ghz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dx11 Capable Video Card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
